attributes.action: make 23rd April, St. George's Day, a Public Holiday.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think that it is right and proper to permit the 23rd April, the day celebratory of the English, as a public holiday. I myself do not feel that said holiday would be unjust, racist (because this country is actually English, you know?), and/or crippling for industry.

It would enstill pride (not jingoism) but also awareness of what being English is all about. 

Overall, I doubt that Mr.Brown (arguably the worst Prime Minister of Modern Britain, I might add) shall pay any attention to this, however we're not here for not trying. 

So come on guys and we can get St.George's Day made a Public Holiday!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
